'''Fate Foretold''' is a permanent [[Event]] unlocked after the player completes the [[Archon Quest]] ''[[Knights of Favonius (Quest)|Knights of Favonius]]''.

==Rewards==
Note that this event does not directly give the player any rewards. It is only a list of requirements needed for four major [[Character]] and [[Weapon]] rewards that can be obtained throughout the [[Prologue]]. The event page will close once all rewards have been obtained. {{Verify}}
